description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Race your avatar against the clock! Run along 30 courses of increasing difficulty. Mind the gaps, avoid the hazards, and make use of boosts and ramps. Race against your friends in 4-player split-screen! Compare your times against other Run! players around the world.
description.short: Race your avatar against the clock! Run along 30 courses of increasing difficulty. Mind the gaps, avoid the hazards, and make use of boosts and ramps. Race against your friends in 4-player split-screen! Compare your times against other Run! players around the world.
